description: At first I didn't see the green indicator, only to notice that it will kick off when it reaches 100 K/s.
summary: Does what it says it does

description:
This app works very well for its described purpose. After installing, I quickly discovered that I don't need this running constantly on my desktop.
Now I use this when I want to copy large folders using the terminal (I rest easy knowing that the terminal isn't stuck for no reason)

So, the "LED" doesn't always show up... only if activity is over some threshold, it seems? But as far as I've been able to tell, there's no way to set or even know what that threshold is (except perhaps by extensive trial and error), and when the activity is below that, clicking on it seems like it's changing something, but it's completely unclear what. Once the LED shows up, it becomes clear that it's changing the size of it, and the changes that were being shown otherwise were just incidental (I think)...

Anyway, a potentially useful indicator, but IMHO, poorly done (at least as of the current version at time of this review).
Еще бы была настройка , выбор диска.
